metadata.description: A savage battle rages as a coalition of warriors led by Lan Mandragoran bravely fight to repel the invasion of the Aiel, a barbarous people from the barren lands of the Aiel Waste. However, while war among men boils forth, the Dark One once again grows powerful, and his minions begin to cast a wicked shadow over the land. New Spring is a graphical adaptation of the best-selling prequel to Robert Jordan's acclaimed fantasy series, The Wheel of Time!
metadata.name: Robert Jordan's New Spring
